title: Royal Allegiance T1 is Looking for a Support for the starter lineup.
body:
**We currently hold the 8th and 9th spot in Open ladder and are looking to make it into play offs and eventually OCS**

We are after Diamond 1 and above applicants for the support role preferably.
Bottom Lane Duo entries open as well. (Marksman and Support)
Exceptions will only be made for players below Diamond 1 if they have had prior experience at higher level team play.

**Traits we are after:**
Dedicated players
Players that take practice and scrim seriously
Good champion pool ( we can work around some picks)
Good strategical understanding of the game
Good relay of information (shotcalling give you bonus points)
Understands Macro level play of the game.

The expectations and demands are high and this is because everyone is putting effort in and I do not wish for obtain a team mate that isnt as driven as them.

Hope to hear from you soon. 

[Website](http://raesports.webs.com/)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/RAeSports/)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/RA_eSports?lang=en)

Add Wolves if interested.

replies.body: just a headsup there are 2 teams thats why he is posting for team 1 if you didn't know
your comment wasnt necessary either, mr ''just trash''
